thread.title: Customer/Marie
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Customer/Marie

author: Customer/Marie
title: Customer/Marie
text: Perfect purchase, great value for money and prompt delivery. Highly recommend using Ce/X, was advised by a friend and will pass it on. My iPhone arrived safely wrapped and was in a good condition as described on the website. Should I need to purchase any other gadget, I will not hesitate ordering from Ce/X.
